thread.title: James Corden Has A Real Problem With Zach Galifianakis | The Huffington Post
thread.title_full: James Corden Has A Real Problem With Zach Galifianakis | The Huffington Post

author: Lee Moran
title: James Corden Has A Real Problem With Zach Galifianakis | The Huffington Post
text:
James Corden Has A Real Problem With Zach Galifianakis "You have to leave." By Lee Moran Zach Galifianakis is the guest that just won’t go away in this parody skit. On Wednesday’s broadcast of the “ Late Late Show ,” the actor took James Corden’s invitation at the end of a previous interview to “come by anytime” a little too literally. No matter how Corden tried to shake off “ The Hangover ” star in the spoof segment, he just wouldn’t take the hint. 
Check out the full clip above. Related Coverage
